de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker
Class UnificationException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.UnificationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class UnificationException
extends Exception

Exception to indicate that an error occurred during the unification algorithm, i.e. that a type equation could not be unified.

Version:
$Rev: 415 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
TypeEquationList.unify(), Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
UnificationException(TypeEquation equation)
          Allocates a new UnificationException object to indicate that the unification of the TypeEquation equationn failed.
 
Method Summary
 Type getTau1()
          Returns the type on the left side of the type equation that could not be unified.
 Type getTau2()
          Returns the type on the right side of the type equation that could not be unified.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Throwable
fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getMessage, getStackTrace, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace, toString
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
